data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Aphanogmus Thomson (Hymenoptera, Ceraphronidae) that parasitizes acarivorous gall midges of Feltiella (Diptera, Cecidomyiidae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matsuo, Kazunori, Ganaha-Kikumura, Tomoko, Ohno, Suguru, Yukawa, Junichi (2016): Description of a new species of Aphanogmus Thomson (Hymenoptera, Ceraphronidae) that parasitizes acarivorous gall midges of Feltiella (Diptera, Cecidomyiidae) in Japan. ZooKeys 596: 77-85, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.596.8472, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.596.8472
